resources.string: Alexa™ is a intelligent voice assistant. It is a product developed by Amazon. The Android™ version is the same as Echo. It can connects to the Alexa Voice Service to play music, make calls, send and receive messages, provide information, news, sports scores, weather, and more—instantly. All you have to do is ask.

1. Conditions of use: This program needs to login Amazon to normal use, so it will pop-up a links to Amazon's website and authorize at first running. 

2. Instructions: There is a microphone icon in the middle of the surface. Click the icon to start recording. Click again to end the recording. Please record your question in the recording state, and Alexa's voice service will return to the result through a speaker after a few moments. 

3. If this document does not help you, send an email to the wcfds@sina.com request help.
